report.title: List of locations for mapping
report.description: Basic list of locations designed for mapping.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) #filters#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the grid square resolution as 1km, 2km or 10km grid

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to

param.name: parent_boundary_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to
param.join: join locations lp on lp.deleted=false and lp.id=#parent_boundary_id#
